segment.source: How to read the driver test results log
segment.target: How to read the driver test results log

segment.source: From the Driver Test Group Explorer, you can display the results from driver tests, save the test results to a folder, or load the results from a folder.
segment.target: From the Driver Test Group Explorer, you can display the results from driver tests, save the test results to a folder, or load the results from a folder.

segment.source: In the Driver Test Group Explorer window, click the Driver Test Group you are interested in.
segment.target: In the Driver Test Group Explorer window, click the Driver Test Group you are interested in.

segment.source: Click the results from a specific test run.
segment.target: Click the results from a specific test run.

segment.source: The results for the test group are shown as a folder titled Results (computer date:time)
segment.target: The results for the test group are shown as a folder titled Results (computer date:time)

segment.source: The results for the tests in that test run are listed.
segment.target: The results for the tests in that test run are listed.

segment.source: Click the name of the test to view the results log.
segment.target: Click the name of the test to view the results log.

segment.source: The results log provides a summary of the tests that were run, along with the details generated by the test cases.
segment.target: The results log provides a summary of the tests that were run, along with the details generated by the test cases.

segment.source: The information recorded included the time and date that each test was run, the name of the remote test computer that ran the test, and the test results (number of tests run, passed, failed).
segment.target: The information recorded included the time and date that each test was run, the name of the remote test computer that ran the test, and the test results (number of tests run, passed, failed).

segment.source: The Test Results window provides a summary of the tests that were run along with the details of each test case.
segment.target: The Test Results window provides a summary of the tests that were run along with the details of each test case.

segment.source: Save the test results to a folder
segment.target: Save the test results to a folder

segment.source: In the Driver Test Group Explorer window, right-click the results from the test run that you are interested in.
segment.target: In the Driver Test Group Explorer window, right-click the results from the test run that you are interested in.

segment.source: Click Save to open a dialog box to save the results to a folder.
segment.target: Click Save to open a dialog box to save the results to a folder.
